alert.note: Alert for Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 2:02PM PST until January 08 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the High Wind Watch, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Southern Humboldt Interior County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 AM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
